title.child2: Find the solution for your needs

part1.child1: How can I share created tours?
part1.child2: The option to share created virtual tours is available only for paid pricing plans. You can grant access to created virtual tours in 3 different ways:
part1.child5: • Receive an online card with a
part1.child8: • Insert the code of our player in your website or app

part2.child1: I already have captured panoramas. Can I use them in the app?
part2.child2: I already have captured panoramas. Can I use them in the app?
part2.child3: Yes, you can. The app supports importing panoramas from your phone’s library. Connection of external cameras to iPhone is not supported in the current versions of the app.

part3.child1: Which spaces are most suitable for using virtual tours?
part3.child2: There are no restrictions on the business sectors that can use virtual tours to their advantage. But they are commonly used in commercial and residential real estate, coworkings, restaurants, hotels, gyms etc.

part4.child1: Which devices does the app support?
part4.child2: Currently, only iOS-operating devices are supported. To create content within the app, it is required to have iPhone 6S or later models. If you have a model of an earlier year of release, then you can use the app as a no-code virtual tour creator from pre-captured content. A version for devices running the Android operating system is under development.

section10.title2: You can always use the free version to test out the features of the app.
